text:
The probability that the DJIA will increase tomorrow is 213. The probability of
an increase in the DJIA stated as odds is:
A. two-to-one.
B. one-to-three.
C. two-to-three.
A discrete uniform distribution (each event has an equal probability of
occurrence) has the following possible outcomes for X: [1, 2, 3, 4). The variance
of this distribution is closest to:
A. 1.00.
B. 1.25.
C. 2.00.
